name: Edda
appearance: Frosted-glass skin with ink-flecked cheeks and careful hands. Wears Archive greys and a thread counter on her thumb.
character: Meticulous and anxious, with a heart that wants to do right and a ledger that keeps complicating it.
traits: keeps a secret index in her head
dreams: Free the erased-names shelf from political edits
Curate a public memory exhibit about the Sunderspark War
secrets: Swapped a page for the Night-Glass to cover a family debt
Knows an echo-pipe that bypasses court halls to a private chamber
